survey_name: Gen Z Preferences for Subscription-Based Fitness Platforms Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and behaviors of Gen Z individuals regarding subscription-based fitness platforms, including usage frequency, preferred features, and factors influencing their choice of service.

questions.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based fitness platforms?
questions.client_notes: Recommended scale for frequency questions. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for option selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based fitness platforms?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in a fitness subscription service? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify priority features. Limit selections to 3 for clearer data.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with max selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in a fitness subscription service? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' in Q1

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you have never used a subscription-based fitness platform?
answer_options: Lack of interest in structured workouts
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Single-choice to pinpoint barriers. Include an 'Other' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with optional open-text follow-up.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you have never used a subscription-based fitness platform?
answer_options: Lack of interest in structured workouts
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: What monthly price range would you consider reasonable for a premium fitness subscription service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who selected 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Pricing sensitivity question. Use clear ranges aligned with market tiers.

script.question_text: What monthly price range would you consider reasonable for a premium fitness subscription service?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who selected 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: Describe your ideal fitness subscription service in one sentence.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Limit to 200 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: Describe your ideal fitness subscription service in one sentence.
